title: Guess the Number
alertExists: Account with that email already exists
alertLogout: Are you sure you wish to log out?
alertDelete: Are you sure want to delete this account?
alertLeave: Are you sure you want to leave the game?
alertInsufficient: Not enough credits to buy a digit, need:
creator: Host
helpScreenInfo1: To join a game, either tap Find Game in the bottom navigation bar and Quick Join a Game for joining the first game available or Find Game to list all the available games and joining.
helpScreenInfo2:
To create your own game, tap Create Game in the bottom navigation bar and select the options you want.
Multiplayer: Enables playing with other players.
Time: Maximum amount of time before the game is over.
Digit Length: Length of the number trying to be guessed (longer the harder).
Round: Out of how many rounds the game is.
Increasing Difficulty: Can only be enabled with multiple rounds selected, increases difficulty each round.
helpScreenInfo3:
The objective of the game is to guess the randomally generated number within a time limit.
After a guess is entered, whichever digits are right in the right place (+) and whichever are right but in the wrong place (-) are shown in the table below.
If you guess it right you win the game.
You'll get scored according to time taken, number of guesses and the difficulty (number length).
If stuck, a not-found digit can be revealed by spending 100 credits from the button on top-right.
name: Name
